title: Chance of getting a box?
body:
I now have 5 keys and get S in most of my games, but I haven't gotten any boxes in months.

What's the chance of getting it?

replies.body:
you can only get a box on a champion once per season.

So playing the same champ over and over wont get you more boxes

Oh wow... That explains it.
How do you suggest I get the boxes? Just get an S with each champion?
Also, can I do it during pre-season?

that is one option. You can also duo que with people. If someone in your party gets an S- on a champion, and you own that champion, have a box available (as shown in your profile tab) as well as haven't unlocked a box with them, you will get a box too.

But yes, the best way is to simply play well on different champions. I'm not 100% on when the boxes reset, whether it is preseason or start of the next season, but you will be able to unlock another box for every champion again next season.

100% provided you are playing a champion that YOU own, when either yourself or someone in your premade gets an S- or better in a game. 

Like _BarryButcher_ said, you can only get one chest per champ, per season (as indicated by the little gold boarder around the champ in the "champions" client tab).
Play a champion that you haven't got a box with and duo with a friend and hope your friend carries ;D
